entry.title: Friday: Chance of snow. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming north 20 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 19 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Friday 13 January 2023
